attributes.action: Invest all of Great Britains resources and manpower into the millitary and embark on a program of conquest of all former Empire collonies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beleive the world was a better place under the Empire and at least this way we wont suffer the terminal decline in the slow and humiliating way we have since 1945 and go out with a bang.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
